com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

Interface TransformableImageSelection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MutableSelection, Selection, StaticImageTransformable, Transformable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TransformableSelection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LassoTool, MarqueeTool

    public interface TransformableImageSelection
extends MutableSelection, Transformable
    A selection in which the pixels of the selected image can be transformed (i.e., change of brightness, opacity, etc.).

    Differs from TransformableSelection in that these transforms do no change the selection shape (outline) or location on the canvas; only the underlying selected image.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void fill(Paint fillPaint, FillFunction fillFunction)
      Fills all transparent pixels in the selection with the given fill paint.
      default void transform(PixelTransform transform)
      Performs a per-pixel transformation on all pixels bound by the selection.
      default void transform(StaticImageTransform transform)
      Performs a transformation on the selected image that does not effect the dimensions, bounds or location of the selection.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection.MutableSelection

        resetSelection, setDirty, setSelectedImage, setSelectionOutline, translateSelection

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection.Selection

        getCanvas, getIdentitySelectionFrame, getSelectedImage, getSelectionCroppedCopy, getSelectionFrame, getSelectionLocation, hasSelection, redrawSelection

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.transform.image.Transformable

        adjustBrightness, adjustTransparency, convolve, invert, operate, reduceColor, reduceGreyscale, removeTranslucency
